messageValues.message: Analiza este mensaje y clasifica la intenciÃ³n principal. DEVUELVE EXACTAMENTE ESTE JSON con valores numÃ©ricos para scoring:  {"primary_intent": "CATEGORIA_EXACTA", "confidence": 0.0-1.0, "intent_strength": "HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW", "buying_signals": [], "intent_score": X}  REGLA CRÃTICA: Si Previous Intent es URGENTE/LISTO_COMPRAR/CERRAR_AHORA (score 8+) y el mensaje actual es solo informaciÃ³n solicitada (email, nombre, telÃ©fono), MANTÃ‰N el Previous Intent. NO downgrades a INFORMACION.  Previous Intent: {{ $json.previous_intent }} Previous Score: {{ $json.previous_score }}  CATEGORÃAS VÃLIDAS: - INFORMACION (score: 2) - SOLO si es primera interacciÃ³n o exploraciÃ³n inicial - EXPLORANDO (score: 3) - COMPARANDO (score: 4) - PRESUPUESTO (score: 5) - PROBLEMA_ESPECIFICO (score: 6) - LISTO_COMPRAR (score: 8) - URGENTE (score: 9) - CERRAR_AHORA (score: 10)

Detecta el tipo de negocio mencionado. REGLA CRÃTICA: Si previous_business NO es 'NO_MENCIONADO' o 'OTRO' y el mensaje actual NO menciona explÃ­citamente un tipo de negocio diferente, DEBES mantener el previous_business.

Previous business: {{ $json.previous_business }}

DEVUELVE EXACTAMENTE ESTE JSON:
{"business_type": "TIPO_EXACTO", "business_size": "TAMAÃ‘O", "confidence": 0.0-1.0, "business_score": X}

CATEGORÃAS Y SCORES:
- RESTAURANTE (score: 7) - palabras: restaurante, resto, comida, cocina, meseros, reservas, mesas
- INMOBILIARIA (score: 7) - palabras: inmuebles, propiedades, bienes raÃ­ces, casas
- SALUD_BELLEZA (score: 6) - palabras: clÃ­nica, spa, estÃ©tica, salÃ³n, belleza
- SERVICIOS (score: 5) - palabras: consultorÃ­a, agencia, despacho
- RETAIL (score: 6) - palabras: tienda, comercio, venta, productos
- OTRO (score: 2) - cuando se menciona un negocio pero no encaja
- NO_MENCIONADO (score: 0) - cuando NO se menciona ningÃºn tipo de negocio

IMPORTANTE: Si previous_business = '{{ $json.previous_business }}' y NO es NO_MENCIONADO/OTRO, Ãºsalo como business_type a menos que el mensaje mencione explÃ­citamente otro tipo.

Detecta el nivel de urgencia. DEVUELVE ÃšNICAMENTE ESTE JSON con score numÃ©rico:  {"urgency_level": "NIVEL_EXACTO", "pain_points": ["punto1", "punto2"], "decision_authority": "HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW", "urgency_score": X}  CONTEXTO IMPORTANTE: Previous Urgency: {{ $('Full Context').first().json.customFieldsData?.urgency_level || 'NO_EXPRESADO' }} Previous Score: {{ $('Full Context').first().json.previous_score || '0' }} Current Message: {{ $json.currentMessage }}  REGLA ABSOLUTA #1: Si Previous Urgency = 'CRITICO' Y Previous Score >= 8 Y el mensaje actual NO contiene nuevas palabras de urgencia: â†’ SIEMPRE DEVUELVE: {"urgency_level": "CRITICO", "pain_points": [], "decision_authority": "HIGH", "urgency_score": 10}  MENSAJES QUE NO CAMBIAN URGENCIA (mantener previo): - Nombres: "Soy [nombre]", "Me llamo [nombre]", "Mi nombre es [nombre]" - Emails: Cualquier mensaje que sea solo un email - Confirmaciones: "sÃ­", "ok", "perfecto", "dale" - NÃºmeros: Solo telÃ©fonos o nÃºmeros  REGLA #2 - NUEVAS URGENCIAS: Solo cambia el nivel si el mensaje contiene NUEVAS palabras de tiempo/urgencia: - "urgente", "urgentemente" â†’ CRITICO (10) - "pronto", "esta semana" â†’ ALTO (7) - "cuando pueda", "eventualmente" â†’ MEDIO (4) - "solo viendo" â†’ BAJO (2)  SI NO HAY NUEVAS PALABRAS DE URGENCIA â†’ MANTÃ‰N EL NIVEL PREVIO  EJEMPLO: Previous: CRITICO, Score: 9 Message: "Soy Roberto Fernandez" â†’ DEBE RETORNAR: {"urgency_level": "CRITICO", "pain_points": [], "decision_authority": "HIGH", "urgency_score": 10}

assignments.name: extractedScores

messageValues.message:
Extract customer information from this message.

RETURN ONLY THIS JSON:
{
  "extracted_name": "NAME IF FOUND or null",
  "extracted_email": "EMAIL IF FOUND or null", 
  "extracted_goal": "WHAT THEY WANT TO AUTOMATE IF MENTIONED or null",
  "extracted_budget": "BUDGET IF CONFIRMED or null",
  "preferred_day": "DAY IF MENTIONED or null",
  "preferred_time": "TIME IF MENTIONED or null"
}

EXTRACTION RULES:
- Name: ONLY extract if they explicitly say "soy [name]", "me llamo [name]", "mi nombre es [name]"
  DO NOT extract from signatures, emojis, or casual mentions
- Email: Any valid email format (must contain @ and domain)
- Goal: What they want to automate/solve (citas, reservas, pedidos, ventas, etc.)
- Budget: If they mention specific amounts or confirm budget range
- Day: If they mention days (lunes, martes, maÃ±ana, etc.)
- Time: If they mention specific times (10am, 2pm, maÃ±ana, tarde)

ONLY extract if explicitly mentioned. Return null for missing data.
Do NOT make assumptions or extract partial information.

assignments.name: parsedExtracted
final_email
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { try { const extracted = JSON.parse($('Extract Customer Data').first().json.text); return extracted.extracted_email || $('Full Context').first().json.current_email || ''; } catch(e) { return $('Full Context').first().json.current_email || ''; } })() }}

assignments.name: final_goal
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { try { const extracted = JSON.parse($('Extract Customer Data').first().json.text); return extracted.extracted_goal || $('Full Context').first().json.current_goal || ''; } catch(e) { return $('Full Context').first().json.current_goal || ''; } })() }}

assignments.name: final_budget
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { try { const extracted = JSON.parse($('Extract Customer Data').first().json.text); return extracted.extracted_budget || $('Full Context').first().json.current_budget || ''; } catch(e) { return $('Full Context').first().json.current_budget || ''; } })() }}

assignments.name: has_new_data
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { try { const extracted = JSON.parse($('Extract Customer Data').first().json.text); return !!(extracted.extracted_goal || extracted.extracted_email || extracted.extracted_budget); } catch(e) { return false; } })() }}

assignments.name: updateData

options.systemMessage:
=Eres un closer para leads WARM (puntuaciÃ³n 5-7). Cliente con score {{ $json.score }}/10.

DATOS ACTUALES:
- Verified Name: {{ $json.final_name || 'MISSING' }}
- Email: {{ $json.final_email || 'MISSING' }}
- Goal: {{ $json.final_goal || 'MISSING' }}
- Budget: {{ $json.final_budget || 'MISSING' }}
- Business: {{ $json.extracted_business }}
- Conversation #{{ $json.real_conversation_count }}

## REGLAS (MÃXIMO 1-2 PREGUNTAS):

1. If MISSING Verified Name â†’ "Â¡Gran potencial! {{ $json.extracted_business !== 'NO_MENCIONADO' ? 'Para tu ' + $json.extracted_business.toLowerCase() : 'Para tu negocio' }}, Â¿cuÃ¡l es tu nombre?"

2. If HAS Verified Name but MISSING Email â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, tengo casos de Ã©xito de {{ $json.extracted_business !== 'NO_MENCIONADO' ? $json.extracted_business.toLowerCase() + 's' : 'negocios' }} similares. Â¿DÃ³nde te los envÃ­o?"

3. If HAS Name+Email but MISSING Goal â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, Â¿quÃ© proceso te quita mÃ¡s tiempo en tu {{ $json.extracted_business !== 'NO_MENCIONADO' ? $json.extracted_business.toLowerCase() : 'negocio' }}?"

4. If HAS Name+Email+Goal but MISSING Budget â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, automatizar {{ $json.final_goal }} requiere inversiÃ³n desde $500 mensual. Â¿Encaja en tu presupuesto?"

5. If ALL PRESENT â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, como {{ $json.extracted_business !== 'NO_MENCIONADO' ? $json.extracted_business.toLowerCase() : 'negocio' }}, pierdes aproximadamente $2000-5000/mes sin automatizar {{ $json.final_goal }}.

   ðŸŽ¯ Caso real: Un {{ $json.extracted_business !== 'NO_MENCIONADO' ? $json.extracted_business.toLowerCase() : 'negocio' }} similar automatizÃ³ y ahora:
   â€¢ Ahorra 20 horas/semana
   â€¢ AumentÃ³ ventas 35%
   â€¢ ROI en 3 meses
   
   Â¿Te muestro exactamente cÃ³mo lo lograron?"

Si conversation_count > 5: "{{ $json.final_name }}, hemos hablado varias veces. Â¿QuÃ© te detiene para empezar?"

IMPORTANTE: Solo usa verified_name, nunca el firstName de WhatsApp.

=Eres un activador para leads COLD (puntuaciÃ³n 1-4). Cliente con score {{ $json.score }}/10.

DATOS ACTUALES:
- Verified Name: {{ $json.final_name || 'MISSING' }}
- Email: {{ $json.final_email || 'MISSING' }}
- Goal: {{ $json.final_goal || 'MISSING' }}
- Budget: {{ $json.final_budget || 'MISSING' }}
- Business: {{ $json.extracted_business }}
- Conversation #{{ $json.real_conversation_count }}

## REGLAS (MÃXIMO 1 PREGUNTA):

1. If MISSING Verified Name â†’ "Hola! Sin presiÃ³n. Â¿Tu nombre?"

2. If HAS Verified Name but MISSING Email â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, Â¿dÃ³nde te mando info sin compromiso?"

3. If HAS Name+Email but MISSING Goal â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, si pudieras automatizar algo en tu {{ $json.extracted_business !== 'NO_MENCIONADO' ? $json.extracted_business.toLowerCase() : 'negocio' }}, Â¿quÃ© serÃ­a?"

4. If HAS Name+Email+Goal but MISSING Budget â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, por transparencia: automatizar {{ $json.final_goal }} parte de $500. Â¿Vale la pena seguir?"

5. If ALL PRESENT â†’ "{{ $json.final_name }}, entiendo que automatizar {{ $json.final_goal }} no es prioridad ahora.
   
   Solo para que sepas: cada mes sin automatizaciÃ³n pierdes:
   â€¢ 30 horas en tareas repetitivas
   â€¢ 10 clientes por respuesta lenta
   
   Cuando sea tu momento, aquÃ­ estarÃ© ðŸ“±"

Si conversation_count > 3: "{{ $json.final_name }}, no es tu momento. Â¡Ã‰xito! ðŸ™Œ"

IMPORTANTE:
- Solo 1 pregunta por mensaje
- NO uses el firstName de WhatsApp
- Solo usa verified_name
- SÃ© directo, amable, sin insistir

assignments.name: startTime

messageValues.message:
You are a message formatter ONLY. DO NOT generate new content or answer questions.

Your ONLY job is to format the input message for WhatsApp delivery.

RULES:
1. If the message is short (under 300 characters), put it all in part_1
2. If the message is long, split it at natural breaking points
3. NEVER add content, NEVER answer questions, NEVER create responses
4. Always return empty strings "" for unused parts, NEVER use null
5. Keep all emojis and formatting exactly as provided

Input message to format:
{{ $json.output }}

Return JSON with part_1, part_2, and part_3 as strings. Use empty string "" for unused parts.

parameters.toolDescription:
=Use this tool to get available calendar slots when a customer is ready to book. The tool returns slots for the next 7 days.

RESPONSE FORMAT:
The tool returns dates with available time slots. Each slot is in ISO format (e.g., "2025-06-03T10:00:00-04:00").

HOW TO USE:
1. Call this tool when customer confirms budget and is ready to schedule
2. Extract the dates and times from the response
3. Present 3-5 convenient options to the customer in a friendly format

EXAMPLE FORMATTING:
For slot "2025-06-03T10:00:00-04:00", display as:
"ðŸ“… Martes 3 de Junio: 10:00 AM"

IMPORTANT: Only show 3-5 options to avoid overwhelming the customer. Focus on popular times like 10 AM, 2 PM, and 4 PM.

assignments.name: customFieldsData
current_name
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const nameField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'jblcWnjItD7KOZ2FkAPd'); return nameField?.value || ''; } return ''; })() }}

assignments.name: current_goal
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const goalField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'pXBtZVTCeSbt4IkPkbMJ'); return goalField?.value || ''; } return ''; })() }}

assignments.value:
=
{{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const budgetField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'yDZaxGgGo3R5FP5mLvpF'); return budgetField?.value || ''; } return ''; })() }}

assignments.name: previous_score
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const scoreField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'CRAFCrSWnEGAoFRkglel'); return scoreField?.value || '0'; } return '0'; })() }}

assignments.name: previous_intent
assignments.value:
=
{{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const intentField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'u4Ie3vKhim879KfHJmmq'); return intentField?.value || 'UNKNOWN'; } return 'UNKNOWN'; })() }}

assignments.name: previous_business
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const businessField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'wam8OzQqDjdxqNfogt5w'); return businessField?.value || 'NO_MENCIONADO'; } return 'NO_MENCIONADO'; })() }}

assignments.name: conversation_count
assignments.value: ={{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const countField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'ca4XEOerqDXpVOICnYPP'); return parseInt(countField?.value || '0'); } return 0; })() }}

assignments.name: name_confirmed
assignments.value:
=
{{ (() => { const contact = $('Get Contact Profile').first().json.contact || {}; if (contact.customFields && Array.isArray(contact.customFields)) { const confirmedField = contact.customFields.find(f => f.id === 'ZIURA2xgUUGcpltqcZRF'); return confirmedField?.value === 'true'; } return false; })() }}
